title: (x) Herold-Leader from Lexington, Ky. newspaper face - Letras Oldstyle {Nicolai}
content: Can You ID This Newspaper Font?
author: dhannah1000

comments.content: what is the name of the paper? where? year?
The Name of The paper is the Herold-Leader from Lexington, Ky.
Check out the embedded fonts in [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20051219065524/http:/www.newseum.org/media/dfp/pdf24/KY_LHL.pdf) pdf-sample from newseum.org
Who designed it and Where to get it?

According to [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20051219065524/http:/www.ascendercorp.com/pdf/Ascender_Corp_Fonts_on_the_Front_Page_11_19_2004.pdf) article (see page 24), it was designed by someone at [FontBureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20051219065524/http:/www.fontbureau.com/clients/newspapers/)
